descriptionHtml:
First install original mod by ken1945 http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15542.
Second install my mod, use nmm and let it overwrite when asked to.

Location: A chest in whiterun near Jorrvaskr,(see images).
Or use console
hit \'\'Â¬\'\' key, open console, type 
player.additem XX000D69 1
player.additem XX000D6B 1
player.additem XX000D6D 1
player.additem XX000d71 1
XX is the load order number in NMM.

Enjoy

  
____________________________________________________________

Special thanks to  MxR and hodilton for the featured videos.
____________________________________________________________

[youtube]yiVmzjvSRdc[/youtube]

Starts at 4:44.
author: Pablo11
